Description: AI-focused entrepreneur and investor, known for founding Apollo (a private AI platform acquired by Liquid AI) and being an early Cash App design team member.
Machine learning engineer and the first Quadruple Kaggle Grandmaster, known for his contributions to AI competitions and education in data science.
ML researcher; co-author of Transformer paper and co-founder/CEO of Cohere
Technology strategist and AI enthusiast, sharing insights on data science and artificial intelligence through his writing and social media presence.
Software engineer; originated the idea behind GitHub Copilot, ex-Microsoft developer tools engineer
AI researcher and entrepreneur who co-founded Creative.ai and has long been a leader in applying artificial intelligence to game development.
CEO and co-founder of Scale AI, a company providing AI data infrastructure, and one of the youngest self-made billionaires in the AI industry.
Global AI leader who led artificial intelligence initiatives at IBM and AWS and is a prominent advocate for inclusive AI and diversity in tech.

Futurist, author, and strategic advisor known for his extensive work on AI, big data, and business transformation, helping organizations understand the impact of emerging technologies.
Tech creator and former Google product manager who blends AI with AR/VR, known for hosting the TED AI show and creating popular content on future tech innovations.

Digital artist and pioneer in AI-generated art, using artificial intelligence to create NFT artwork and championing AI as a tool for creative expression.

Co-founder and CEO of Hugging Face, an open-source AI platform/community
Tech entrepreneur and investor, co-founder of Cue and the Pioneer incubator, who now focuses on backing and advising cutting-edge AI startups.
Computer scientist and AI pioneer, co-founder of Coursera and founder of Insitro, leveraging machine learning for education and drug discovery.

Tech executive who led IBM's Watson AI unit as SVP and later served as CEO of Nielsen, focusing on leveraging AI and data analytics to drive business strategy.
Tech entrepreneur & investor; GP at Craft Ventures, former PayPal COO
AI and risk analytics expert advocating for making AI accessible to all, with nearly three decades of experience applying machine learning in finance and enterprise consulting.

Indie hacker and developer; founder of multiple AI-driven projects and learning platforms

Serial entrepreneur, investor, and author who has backed numerous AI and tech startups and is known for his industry guidebook 'High Growth Handbook'.
AI alignment researcher; co-founder of MIRI and prominent AI safety advocate
Prominent tech entrepreneur, CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, co-founder of OpenAI, and founder of xAI, with significant influence on the development and direction of artificial intelligence technologies.
Founder and CEO of Stability AI, the company behind the generative AI model Stable Diffusion, and a key figure in the open-source AI community.
Founder of Bolt.new
Stanford professor and author researching the economic impact of AI, co-author of 'The Second Machine Age' and an authority on how AI and automation affect productivity and society.
Technology consultant and former Microsoft executive with deep expertise in AI and digital transformation, advising organizations on leveraging artificial intelligence for innovation.

Science communicator and AI researcher whose YouTube channel explains AI and machine learning concepts, making complex technologies understandable to a broad audience.
Statistician and educator best known for his StatQuest YouTube channel, where he uses clear visuals and analogies to explain machine learning and statistical concepts in simple terms.

Journalist who specializes in covering artificial intelligence, formerly at MIT Technology Review and now at The Wall Street Journal, known for investigating AI's social and ethical implications.

Marketing executive; VP of Marketing at Mautic (marketing automation)

Community dedicated to improving human reasoning and decision-making, focusing on AI

Creative indie maker and developer known for innovative web experiments

Internet pioneer and venture capitalist at Andreessen Horowitz, known for co-founding Netscape and for his influential essays and investments in software and AI technology.

Digital transformation executive and advisor, former Chief Digital Officer at SAP Ariba and Chief Innovation Officer at Celonis, known for driving AI-powered process optimization and supply chain innovation.
AI and big data consultant who advises global businesses on analytics and machine learning strategies, recognized as a top influencer in the AI and data science community.
CEO of GoodAI and founder of Keen Software House, investing in general AI research while also known for creating popular video games, bridging the worlds of entertainment and artificial intelligence.

Science writer and researcher who focuses on artificial intelligence, algorithms, and data, offering critical insights into AI technology and its societal implications.

Economist and futurist (George Mason Univ.); pioneer in prediction markets and author

Entrepreneur and writer; co-founder of Foster (writing community), working on AI writing tools

Tech entrepreneur and CEO who merges AI with sustainability in retail, having founded platforms like Eachthing (prduct) and advising on the use of AI to revolutionize supply chains and consumer engagement.
